Default.PoolId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito Identity pool id, eg: us-west-2:1234abc-1234-5678-9012-abcdef123456
Default.Region: Replace with your Amazon Cognito region, eg: us-west-2

Default.PoolId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool id, eg: us-west-2_AbCD12345
Default.AppClientId: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool App client id, eg: 12345678grps001gpgsabcdefg
Default.AppClientSecret: Replace with your Amazon Cognito User Pool App client secret, click Show details
Default.Region: Replace with your Amazon Cognito region, eg: us-west-2
